references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), the explicit point-based representation that TaoAvatar builds upon for its real-time rendering capabilities.

references.paper_title: Smpl: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper presents SMPL, a skinned multi-person linear model that is a parametric human body model and a key component in TaoAvatar's parametric template creation.

references.paper_title: Expressive body capture: 3D hands, face, and body from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces SMPLX, an expressive body capture system for hands, face and body which TaoAvatar uses as a key component in its parametric template creation.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a method for representing scenes and TaoAvatar cites it in the context of its parametric models.

references.paper_title: Animatable gaussians: Learning pose-dependent gaussian maps for high-fidelity human avatar modeling
references.reason: This paper introduces Animatable Gaussians, which also combines 3DGS with parametric human models and inspires TaoAvatar's approach to handle complex non-rigid deformations.
